Sched::ActivateClosureCallback

Sched::ActivateClosureCallback Class Reference
[Graph]

Callback to manage synchronization between data flow execution and communication (set the Closure to S_INIT when all GlobalDatas are received). More...

Detailed Description

Callback to manage synchronization between data flow execution and communication (set the Closure to S_INIT when all GlobalDatas are received).
